# Number of Bytes

> Size (in bytes) of a 16-bit signed integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var INT16_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/int16-num-bytes' );
```

#### INT16_NUM_BYTES

Size (in bytes) of a 16-bit signed integer.

```javascript
var bool = ( INT16_NUM_BYTES === 2 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

var INT16_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/int16-num-bytes' );
